Title: Advance victoriously while following Chairman Mao's proletarian line in literature and the arts
Designer: Hangzhou Fine Arts Group (杭州市美术工作团)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin chubanshe (浙江人民出版社)
Notes: A group of 'sent down youth' (secondary school graduates and students sent from cities to the countryside) with musical instruments and theatre props. The red lantern indicates they will perform the Model Opera Hongdengji (红灯记, The Legend of the Red Lantern).
Theme: Model Operas (Yangbanxi)Up to the mountains, down to the villages (1968)
Tags: The Legend of the Red Lantern
